constellations.name: Conviction
constellations.effect: Diluc deals 15% more DMG to opponents whose HP is above 50%.

constellations.name: Searing Ember
constellations.effect: When Diluc takes DMG, his ATK increases by 10% and his ATK SPD increases by 5%. Lasts for 10s.\nThis effect can stack up to 3 times and can only occur once every 1.5s.

constellations.name: Fire and Steel
constellations.effect: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Searing Onslaught</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Flowing Flame
constellations.effect: Casting <color=#FFD780FF>Searing Onslaught</color> in rhythm greatly increases damage dealt.\n2s after casting <color=#FFD780FF>Searing Onslaught</color>, casting the next Searing Onslaught in the combo deals 40% additional DMG. This effect lasts for 2s.

constellations.name: Phoenix, Harbinger of Dawn
constellations.effect: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Dawn</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Flaming Sword, Nemesis of the Dark
constellations.effect: After casting <color=#FFD780FF>Searing Onslaught</color>, the next 2 Normal Attacks within the next 6s will have their DMG and ATK SPD increased by 30%.\nAdditionally, Searing Onslaught will not interrupt the Normal Attack combo.

constellations.name: Gaze of the Deep
constellations.effect: Even when Oz is not present in combat, he can still watch over Fischl through his raven eyes. When Fischl performs a Normal Attack against an opponent, Oz fires a joint attack, dealing DMG equal to 22% of Fischl's ATK.

constellations.name: Devourer of All Sins
constellations.effect: When <color=#FFD780FF>Nightrider</color> is used, it deals an additional 200% ATK as DMG, and its AoE is increased by 50%.

constellations.name: Wings of Nightmare
constellations.effect: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Nightrider</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Her Pilgrimage of Bleak
constellations.effect: When <color=#FFD780FF>Midnight Phantasmagoria</color> is used, it deals 222% of ATK as <color=#FFACFFFF>Electro DMG</color> to surrounding opponents.\nWhen the skill duration ends, Fischl regenerates 20% of her HP.

constellations.name: Against the Fleeing Light
constellations.effect: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Midnight Phantasmagoria</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Evernight Raven
constellations.effect: Extends the duration of Oz's presence on the field by 2s. Additionally, Oz performs joint attacks with your active character when present, dealing 30% of Fischl's ATK as <color=#FFACFFFF>Electro DMG</color>.

constellations.name: I Got Your Back
constellations.effect: While <color=#FFD780FF>Sweeping Time</color> and <color=#FFD780FF>Breastplate</color> are both in effect, the chance of Breastplate's healing effects activating is increased to 100%.

constellations.name: Combat Maid
constellations.effect: Decreases the Stamina Consumption of Noelle's Charged Attacks by 20% and increases her Charged Attack DMG by 15%.

constellations.name: Invulnerable Maid
constellations.effect: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Breastplate</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: To Be Cleaned
constellations.effect: When <color=#FFD780FF>Breastplate</color>'s duration expires or it is destroyed by DMG, it will deal 400% ATK of <color=#FFE699FF>Geo DMG</color> to surrounding opponents.

constellations.name: Favonius Sweeper Master
constellations.effect: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Sweeping Time</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Must Be Spotless
constellations.effect: <color=#FFD780FF>Sweeping Time</color> increases Noelle's ATK by an additional 50% of her DEF.\nAdditionally, every opponent defeated during the skill's duration adds 1s to the duration, up to 10s.

constellations.name: The Scent Remained
constellations.effect: Increases the maximum number of Rain Swords by 1.

constellations.name: Rainbow Upon the Azure Sky
constellations.effect: Extends the duration of <color=#FFD780FF>Guhua Sword: Raincutter</color> by 3s.\nDecreases the <color=#80C0FFFF>Hydro RES</color> of opponents hit by sword rain attacks by 15% for 4s.

constellations.name: Weaver of Verses
constellations.effect: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Guhua Sword: Raincutter</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Evilsoother
constellations.effect: Throughout the duration of <color=#FFD780FF>Guhua Sword: Raincutter</color>, the DMG dealt by <color=#FFD780FF>Guhua Sword: Fatal Rainscreen</color> is increased by 50%.

constellations.name: Embrace of Rain
constellations.effect: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Guhua Sword: Fatal Rainscreen</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Hence, Call Them My Own Verses
constellations.effect: Activating 2 of <color=#FFD780FF>Guhua Sword: Raincutter</color>'s sword rain attacks greatly enhances the third sword rain attack. On hit, the third sword rain attack also regenerates 3 Energy for Xingqiu.

constellations.name: A Lingering Flavor
constellations.effect: Regenerates 15 Energy for Diona after the effects of <color=#FFD780FF>Signature Mix</color> end.

constellations.name: Shaken, Not Purred
constellations.effect: Increases <color=#FFD780FF>Icy Paws</color>' DMG by 15%, and increases its shield's DMG Absorption by 15%.\nAdditionally, when paws hit their targets, creates a shield for other nearby characters on the field with 50% of the <color=#FFD780FF>Icy Paws</color> shield's DMG Absorption for 5s.

constellations.name: A—Another Round?
constellations.effect: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Signature Mix</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Wine Industry Slayer
constellations.effect: Within the radius of <color=#FFD780FF>Signature Mix</color>, Diona's charge time for aimed shots is reduced by 60%

constellations.name: Double Shot, On The Rocks
constellations.effect: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Icy Paws</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Cat's Tail Closing Time
constellations.effect: Characters within <color=#FFD780FF>Signature Mix</color>'s radius will gain the following effects based on their HP amounts:\n·Increases Incoming Healing Bonus by 30% when HP falls below or is equal to 50%.\n·Elemental Mastery increased by 200 when HP is above 50%.

constellations.name: Crispy Outside, Tender Inside
constellations.effect: Opponents hit by Guoba's attacks have their <color=#FF9999FF>Pyro RES</color> reduced by 15% for 6s.

constellations.name: Oil Meets Fire
constellations.effect: The last attack in a Normal Attack sequence applies the Implode status onto the opponent for 2s. An explosion will occur once this duration ends, dealing 75% of Xiangling's ATK as <color=#FF9999FF>AoE Pyro DMG</color>.

constellations.name: Deepfry
constellations.effect: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Pyronado</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Slowbake
constellations.effect: <color=#FFD780FF>Pyronado</color>'s duration is increased by 40%.

constellations.name: Guoba Mad
constellations.effect: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Guoba Attack</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Condensed Pyronado
constellations.effect: For the duration of <color=#FFD780FF>Pyronado</color>, all party members receive a 15% <color=#FF9999FF>Pyro DMG Bonus</color>.

constellations.name: Grand Expectation
constellations.effect: <color=#FFD780FF>Fantastic Voyage</color>'s ATK increase no longer has an HP restriction, and gains an additional 20% of Bennett's Base ATK.

constellations.name: Impasse Conqueror
constellations.effect: When Bennett's HP falls below 70%, his Energy Recharge is increased by 30%.

constellations.name: Unstoppable Fervor
constellations.effect: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Passion Overload</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Unexpected Odyssey
constellations.effect: Using a Normal Attack when executing the second attack of <color=#FFD780FF>Passion Overload</color>'s Charge Level 1 allows an additional attack to be performed.\nThis additional attack does 135% of the second attack's DMG.

constellations.name: True Explorer
constellations.effect: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Fantastic Voyage</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Fire Ventures with Me
constellations.effect: Sword, Claymore, or Polearm-wielding characters inside <color=#FFD780FF>Fantastic Voyage</color>'s radius gain a 15% <color=#FF9999FF>Pyro DMG Bonus</color> and their weapons are infused with <color=#FF9999FF>Pyro</color>.

constellations.name: Sea Beast's Scourge
constellations.effect: When <color=#FFD780FF>Stormbreaker</color> is used:\nCreates a shield that absorbs up to 16% of Beidou's Max HP for 15s.\nThis shield absorbs <color=#FFACFFFF>Electro DMG</color> 250% more effectively.

constellations.name: Upon the Turbulent Sea, the Thunder Arises
constellations.effect: <color=#FFD780FF>Stormbreaker</color>'s arc lightning can jump to 2 additional targets.

constellations.name: Summoner of Storm
constellations.effect: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Tidecaller</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Stunning Revenge
constellations.effect: Within 10s of taking DMG, Beidou's Normal Attacks gain 20% additional <color=#FFACFFFF>Electro DMG</color>.

constellations.name: Crimson Tidewalker
constellations.effect: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Stormbreaker</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Bane of Evil
constellations.effect: During the duration of <color=#FFD780FF>Stormbreaker</color>, the <color=#FFACFFFF>Electro RES</color> of surrounding opponents is decreased by 15%.

constellations.name: Unholy Revelation
constellations.effect: When Rosaria deals a CRIT Hit, her ATK SPD increases by 10% and her Normal Attack DMG increases by 10% for 4s.

constellations.name: Land Without Promise
constellations.effect: The duration of the Ice Lance created by <color=#FFD780FF>Rites of Termination</color> is increased by 4s.

constellations.name: The Wages of Sin
constellations.effect: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Ravaging Confession</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Painful Grace
constellations.effect: <color=#FFD780FF>Ravaging Confession</color>'s CRIT Hits regenerate 5 Energy for Rosaria.\nCan only be triggered once each time Ravaging Confession is cast.

constellations.name: Last Rites
constellations.effect: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Rites of Termination</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Divine Retribution
constellations.effect: <color=#FFD780FF>Rites of Termination</color>'s attack decreases opponents' Physical RES by 20% for 10s.

constellations.name: Splitting Gales
constellations.effect: Fires 2 additional arrows per <color=#FFD780FF>Aimed Shot</color>, each dealing 33% of the original arrow's DMG.

constellations.name: Breeze of Reminiscence
constellations.effect: <color=#FFD780FF>Skyward Sonnet</color> decreases opponents' <color=#80FFD7FF>Anemo RES</color> and Physical RES by 12% for 10s.\nOpponents launched by <color=#FFD780FF>Skyward Sonnet</color> suffer an additional 12% <color=#80FFD7FF>Anemo RES</color> and Physical RES decrease while airborne.

constellations.name: Ode to Thousand Winds
constellations.effect: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Wind's Grand Ode</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Hurricane of Freedom
constellations.effect: When Venti picks up an Elemental Orb or Particle, he receives a 25% <color=#80FFD7FF>Anemo DMG Bonus</color> for 10s.

constellations.name: Concerto dal Cielo
constellations.effect: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Skyward Sonnet</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Storm of Defiance
constellations.effect: Targets who take DMG from <color=#FFD780FF>Wind's Grand Ode</color> have their <color=#80FFD7FF>Anemo RES</color> decreased by 20%.\nIf an Elemental Absorption occurred, then their RES towards the corresponding Element is also decreased by 20%.

constellations.name: Wolf's Instinct
constellations.effect: Picking up an Elemental Orb or Particle increases Razor's DMG by 10% for 8s.

constellations.name: Suppression
constellations.effect: Increases CRIT Rate against opponents with less than 30% HP by 10%.

constellations.name: Soul Companion
constellations.effect: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Lightning Fang</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Bite
constellations.effect: #When casting <color=#FFD780FF>Claw and Thunder</color> ({LAYOUT_MOBILE#Tap}{LAYOUT_PC#Press}{LAYOUT_PS#Press}), opponents hit will have their DEF decreased by 15% for 7s.

constellations.name: Sharpened Claws
constellations.effect: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Claw and Thunder</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Lupus Fulguris
constellations.effect: Every 10s, Razor's sword charges up, causing the next Normal Attack to release lightning that deals 100% of Razor's ATK as <color=#FFACFFFF>Electro DMG</color>.\nWhen Razor is not using <color=#FFD780FF>Lightning Fang</color>, a lightning strike on an opponent will grant Razor an Electro Sigil for <color=#FFD780FF>Claw and Thunder</color>.

constellations.name: Thundering Might
constellations.effect: Recasting <color=#FFD780FF>Stellar Restoration</color> while a Lightning Stiletto is present causes Keqing to deal 50% of her ATK as <color=#FFACFFFF>AoE Electro DMG</color> at the start point and terminus of her Blink.

constellations.name: Keen Extraction
constellations.effect: When Keqing's Normal and Charged Attacks hit opponents affected by <color=#FFACFFFF>Electro</color>, they have a 50% chance of producing an Elemental Particle.\nThis effect can only occur once every 5s.

constellations.name: Foreseen Reformation
constellations.effect: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Starward Sword</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Attunement
constellations.effect: For 10s after Keqing triggers an <color=#FFACFFFF>Electro-related Elemental Reaction</color>, her ATK is increased by 25%.

constellations.name: Beckoning Stars
constellations.effect: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Stellar Restoration</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Tenacious Star
constellations.effect: When initiating a Normal Attack, a Charged Attack, Elemental Skill or Elemental Burst, Keqing gains a 6% <color=#FFACFFFF>Electro DMG Bonus</color> for 8s.\nEffects triggered by Normal Attacks, Charged Attacks, Elemental Skills and Elemental Bursts are considered independent entities.

constellations.name: Foul Legacy: Tide Withholder
constellations.effect: Decreases the CD of <color=#FFD780FF>Foul Legacy: Raging Tide</color> by 20%

constellations.name: Foul Legacy: Understream
constellations.effect: When opponents affected by Riptide are defeated, Tartaglia regenerates 4 Elemental Energy.

constellations.name: Abyssal Mayhem: Vortex of Turmoil
constellations.effect: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Foul Legacy: Raging Tide</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Abyssal Mayhem: Hydrospout
constellations.effect: If Tartaglia is in <color=#FFD780FF>Foul Legacy: Raging Tide</color>'s Melee Stance, triggers Riptide Slash against opponents on the field affected by Riptide every 4s, otherwise, triggers Riptide Flash.\nRiptide Slashes and Riptide Flashes triggered by this Constellation effect are not subject to the time intervals that would typically apply to these two Riptide effects, nor do they have any effect on those time intervals.

constellations.name: Havoc: Formless Blade
constellations.effect: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Havoc: Obliteration</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Havoc: Annihilation
constellations.effect: When <color=#FFD780FF>Havoc: Obliteration</color> is cast in Melee Stance, the CD of <color=#FFD780FF>Foul Legacy: Raging Tide</color> is reset.\nThis effect will only take place once Tartaglia returns to his Ranged Stance.

constellations.name: Gleeful Songs
constellations.effect: Barbara regenerates 1 Energy every 10s.

constellations.name: Vitality Burst
constellations.effect: Decreases the CD of <color=#FFD780FF>Let the Show Begin♪</color> by 15%.\nDuring the ability's duration, your active character gains a 15% <color=#80C0FFFF>Hydro DMG Bonus</color>.

constellations.name: Star of Tomorrow
constellations.effect: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Shining Miracle♪</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Attentiveness be My Power
constellations.effect: Every opponent Barbara hits with her Charged Attack regenerates 1 Energy for her.\nA maximum of 5 energy can be regenerated in this manner with any one Charged Attack.

constellations.name: The Purest Companionship
constellations.effect: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Let the Show Begin♪</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Dedicating Everything to You
constellations.effect:
When Barbara is in the party but not on the field, and one of your own party members falls:
·Automatically revives the fallen character.
·Fully restores the revived character's HP to 100%.
This effect can only occur once every 15 mins.

constellations.name: Prophecy of Submersion
constellations.effect:
When any of your own party members hits an opponent affected by an Omen, the effects of <color=#80C0FFFF>Hydro-related Elemental Reactions</color> are enhanced for 8s:
·Electro-Charged DMG increases by 15%.
·Vaporize DMG increases by 15%.
·Hydro Swirl DMG increases by 15%.
·Frozen duration is extended by 15%.

constellations.name: Lunar Chain
constellations.effect: When a Normal Attack hits, there is a 20% chance that it will be automatically followed by a Charged Attack.\nThis effect can only occur once every 5s.

constellations.name: Restless Revolution
constellations.effect: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Stellaris Phantasm</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Prophecy of Oblivion
constellations.effect: When any party member attacks an opponent affected by an Omen, their CRIT Rate is increased by 15%.

constellations.name: Mockery of Fortuna
constellations.effect: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Mirror Reflection of Doom</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Rhetorics of Calamitas
constellations.effect: Upon entering <color=#FFD780FF>Illusory Torrent</color>, Mona gains a 60% increase to the DMG of her next Charged Attack per second of movement.\nA maximum DMG Bonus of 180% can be achieved in this manner. The effect lasts for no more than 8s.

constellations.name: Dew-Drinker
constellations.effect: Taking DMG from a Charge Level 2 Frostflake Arrow or Frostflake Arrow Bloom decreases opponents' <color=#99FFFFFF>Cryo RES</color> by 15% for 6s.\nA hit regenerates 2 Energy for Ganyu. This effect can only occur once per Charge Level 2 Frostflake Arrow, regardless if Frostflake Arrow itself or its Bloom hit the target.

constellations.name: The Auspicious
constellations.effect: <color=#FFD780FF>Trail of the Qilin</color> gains 1 additional charge.

constellations.name: Cloud-Strider
constellations.effect: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Celestial Shower</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Westward Sojourn
constellations.effect: Opponents standing within the AoE of <color=#FFD780FF>Celestial Shower</color> take increased DMG. This effect strengthens over time.\nIncreased DMG taken begins at 5% and increases by 5% every 3s, up to a maximum of 25%.\nThe effect lingers for 3s after the opponent leaves the AoE.

constellations.name: The Merciful
constellations.effect: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Trail of the Qilin</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: The Clement
constellations.effect: Using <color=#FFD780FF>Trail of the Qilin</color> causes the next Frostflake Arrow shot within 30s to not require charging.

constellations.name: Crimson Bouquet
constellations.effect: While in a <color=#FFD780FF>Paramita Papilio</color> state activated by <color=#FFD780FF>Guide to Afterlife</color>, Hu Tao's Charge Attacks do not consume Stamina.

constellations.name: Ominous Rainfall
constellations.effect: Increases the <color=#FFD780FF>Blood Blossom</color> DMG by an amount equal to 10% of Hu Tao's Max HP at the time the effect is applied.\nAdditionally, <color=#FFD780FF>Spirit Soother</color> will also apply the <color=#FFD780FF>Blood Blossom</color> effect.

constellations.name: Lingering Carmine
constellations.effect: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Guide to Afterlife</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Garden of Eternal Rest
constellations.effect: Upon defeating an enemy affected by a <color=#FFD780FF>Blood Blossom</color> that Hu Tao applied herself, all nearby allies in the party (excluding Hu Tao herself) will have their CRIT Rate increased by 12% for 15s.

constellations.name: Floral Incense
constellations.effect: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Spirit Soother</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Butterfly's Embrace
constellations.effect:
Triggers when Hu Tao's HP drops below 25%, or when she suffers a lethal strike:
Hu Tao will not fall as a result of the DMG sustained. Additionally, for the next 10s, all of her Elemental and Physical RES is increased by 200%, her CRIT Rate is increased by 100%, and her resistance to interruption is greatly increased.
This effect triggers automatically when Hu Tao has 1 HP left.
Can only occur once every 60s.

constellations.name: Raging Vortex
constellations.effect: <color=#FFD780FF>Palm Vortex</color> pulls in opponents and objects within a 5m radius.

constellations.name: Uprising Whirlwind
constellations.effect: Increases Energy Recharge by 16%.

constellations.name: Sweeping Gust
constellations.effect: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Gust Surge</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Cherishing Breezes
constellations.effect: Reduces DMG taken while casting <color=#FFD780FF>Palm Vortex</color> by 10%.

constellations.name: Vortex Stellaris
constellations.effect: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Palm Vortex</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Intertwined Winds
constellations.effect: Targets who take DMG from <color=#FFD780FF>Gust Surge</color> have their <color=#80FFD7FF>Anemo RES</color> decreased by 20%.\nIf an Elemental Absorption occurred, then their RES towards the corresponding Element is also decreased by 20%.

constellations.name: Dissolution Eon: Destroyer of Worlds
constellations.effect: Increases <color=#FFD780FF>Lemniscatic Wind Cycling</color>'s charges by 1.

constellations.name: Annihilation Eon: Blossom of Kaleidos
constellations.effect: When in the party and not on the field, Xiao's Energy Recharge is increased by 25%.

constellations.name: Conqueror of Evil: Wrath Deity
constellations.effect: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Lemniscatic Wind Cycling</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Transcension: Extinction of Suffering
constellations.effect: When Xiao's HP falls below 50%, he gains a 100% DEF Bonus.

constellations.name: Evolution Eon: Origin of Ignorance
constellations.effect: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Bane of All Evil</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Conqueror of Evil: Guardian Yaksha
constellations.effect: While under the effects of <color=#FFD780FF>Bane of All Evil</color>, hitting at least 2 opponents with Xiao's Plunging Attack will immediately grant him 1 charge of <color=#FFD780FF>Lemniscatic Wind Cycling</color>, and for the next 1s, he may use Lemniscatic Wind Cycling while ignoring its CD.

constellations.name: Spiraling Tempest
constellations.effect: Increases the pulling speed of <color=#FFD780FF>Gale Blade</color> after holding for more than 1s, and increases the DMG dealt by 40%.

constellations.name: People's Aegis
constellations.effect: When Jean picks up an Elemental Orb/Particle, all party members have their Movement SPD and ATK SPD increased by 15% for 15s.

constellations.name: When the West Wind Arises
constellations.effect: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Dandelion Breeze</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Lands of Dandelion
constellations.effect: Within the Field created by <color=#FFD780FF>Dandelion Breeze</color>, all opponents have their <color=#80FFD7FF>Anemo RES</color> decreased by 40%.

constellations.name: Outbursting Gust
constellations.effect: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Gale Blade</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Lion's Fang, Fair Protector of Mondstadt
constellations.effect: Incoming DMG is decreased by 35% within the Field created by <color=#FFD780FF>Dandelion Breeze</color>. Upon leaving the Dandelion Field, this effect lasts for 3 attacks or 10s.

constellations.name: Chained Reactions
constellations.effect: Attacks and Skills have a certain chance to summon sparks that bombard opponents, dealing DMG equal to 120% of <color=#FFD780FF>Sparks 'n' Splash</color>'s DMG.

constellations.name: Explosive Frags
constellations.effect: Being hit by <color=#FFD780FF>Jumpy Dumpty</color>'s mines decreases opponents' DEF by 23% for 10s.

constellations.name: Exquisite Compound
constellations.effect: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Jumpy Dumpty</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Sparkly Explosion
constellations.effect: If Klee leaves the field during the duration of <color=#FFD780FF>Sparks 'n' Splash</color>, her departure triggers an explosion that deals 555% of her ATK as <color=#FF9999FF>AoE Pyro DMG</color>.

constellations.name: Nova Burst
constellations.effect: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Sparks 'n' Splash</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Blazing Delight
constellations.effect: While under the effects of <color=#FFD780FF>Sparks 'n' Splash</color>, Klee will regenerate 3 Energy for all members of the party (excluding Klee) every 3s.\nWhen <color=#FFD780FF>Sparks 'n' Splash</color> is used, all party members will gain a 10% <color=#FF9999FF>Pyro DMG Bonus</color> for 25s.

constellations.name: Ascetics of Frost
constellations.effect: When the Herald of Frost hits an opponent marked by a Fortune-Preserving Talisman, Qiqi regenerates 2 Energy.

constellations.name: Frozen to the Bone
constellations.effect: Qiqi's Normal and Charge Attack DMG against opponents affected by <color=#99FFFFFF>Cryo</color> is increased by 15%.

constellations.name: Ascendant Praise
constellations.effect: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Adeptus Art: Preserver of Fortune</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Divine Suppression
constellations.effect: Targets marked by the Fortune-Preserving Talisman have their ATK decreased by 20%.

constellations.name: Crimson Lotus Bloom
constellations.effect: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Adeptus Art: Herald of Frost</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Rite of Resurrection
constellations.effect: Using <color=#FFD780FF>Adeptus Art: Preserver of Fortune</color> revives all fallen party members nearby and regenerates 50% of their HP.\nThis effect can only occur once every 15 mins.

constellations.name: Tidal Illusion
constellations.effect: Every time <color=#FFD780FF>Icetide Vortex</color>'s Grimheart stacks are consumed, Eula's Physical DMG is increased by 30% for 6s.\nEach stack consumed will increase the duration of this effect by 6s up to a maximum of 18s.

constellations.name: Lady of Seafoam
constellations.effect: #Decreases the CD of <color=#FFD780FF>Icetide Vortex</color>'s Holding Mode, rendering it identical to {LAYOUT_MOBILE#Tapping}{LAYOUT_PC#Press}{LAYOUT_PS#Press} CD.

constellations.name: Lawrence Pedigree
constellations.effect: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Glacial Illumination</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: The Obstinacy of One's Inferiors
constellations.effect: Lightfall Swords deal 25% increased DMG against opponents with less than 50% HP.

constellations.name: Chivalric Quality
constellations.effect: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Icetide Vortex</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Noble Obligation
constellations.effect: Lightfall Swords created by <color=#FFD780FF>Glacial Illumination</color> start with 5 stacks of energy. Normal Attacks, Elemental Skills, and Elemental Bursts have a 50% chance to grant the Lightfall Sword an additional stack of energy.

constellations.name: Clustered Vacuum Field
constellations.effect: <color=#FFD780FF>Astable Anemohypostasis Creation - 6308</color> gains 1 additional charge.

constellations.name: Beth: Unbound Form
constellations.effect: The duration of <color=#FFD780FF>Forbidden Creation - Isomer 75 / Type II</color> is increased by 2s.

constellations.name: Flawless Alchemistress
constellations.effect: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Astable Anemohypostasis Creation - 6308</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Alchemania
constellations.effect: Every 7 Normal and Charged Attacks, Sucrose will reduce the CD of <color=#FFD780FF>Astable Anemohypostasis Creation - 6308</color> by 1-7s.

constellations.name: Caution: Standard Flask
constellations.effect: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Forbidden Creation - Isomer 75 / Type II</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Chaotic Entropy
constellations.effect: If <color=#FFD780FF>Forbidden Creation - Isomer 75 / Type II</color> triggers an Elemental Absorption, all party members gain a 20% Elemental DMG Bonus for the corresponding absorbed element during its duration.

constellations.name: Rock, the Backbone of Earth
constellations.effect: Increases the maximum number of Stone Steles created by <color=#FFD780FF>Dominus Lapidis</color> that may exist simultaneously to 2.

constellations.name: Stone, the Cradle of Jade
constellations.effect: <color=#FFD780FF>Planet Befall</color> grants nearby characters on the field a Jade Shield when it descends.

constellations.name: Jade, Shimmering through Darkness
constellations.effect: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Dominus Lapidis</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Topaz, Unbreakable and Fearless
constellations.effect: Increases <color=#FFD780FF>Planet Befall</color>'s AoE by 20% and increases the duration of Planet Befall's Petrification effect by 2s.

constellations.name: Lazuli, Herald of the Order
constellations.effect: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Planet Befall</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Chrysos, Bounty of Dominator
constellations.effect: When the Jade Shield takes DMG, 40% of that incoming DMG is converted to HP for the current character.\nA single instance of regeneration cannot exceed 8% of that character's Max HP.

constellations.name: Fatal Acceleration
constellations.effect: Upon scoring a CRIT Hit, increases ATK SPD of Xinyan's Normal and Charged Attacks by 12% for 5s.\nCan only occur once every 5s.

constellations.name: Impromptu Opening
constellations.effect: <color=#FFD780FF>Riff Revolution</color>'s Physical DMG has its CRIT Rate increased by 100%, and will form a shield at Shield Level 3: Rave when cast.

constellations.name: Double-Stop
constellations.effect: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Sweeping Fervor</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Wildfire Rhythm
constellations.effect: <color=#FFD780FF>Sweeping Fervor</color>'s swing DMG decreases opponent's Physical RES by 15% for 12s.

constellations.name: Screamin' for an Encore
constellations.effect: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Riff Revolution</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Rockin' in a Flaming World
constellations.effect: Decreases the Stamina Consumption of Xinyan's Charged Attacks by 30%. Additionally, Xinyan's Charged Attacks gain an ATK Bonus equal to 50% of her DEF.

constellations.name: Invincible Stonewall
constellations.effect: Party members within the radius of <color=#FFD780FF>Wake of Earth</color> have their CRIT Rate increased by 10% and have increased resistance against interruption.

constellations.name: Rockcore Meltdown
constellations.effect: When the meteorite created by <color=#FFD780FF>Starfell Sword</color> is destroyed, it will also explode, dealing additional <color=#FFE699FF>AoE Geo DMG</color> equal to the amount of damage dealt by Starfell Sword.

constellations.name: Will of the Rock
constellations.effect: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Wake of Earth</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Reaction Force
constellations.effect: The shockwave triggered by <color=#FFD780FF>Wake of Earth</color> regenerates 5 Energy for every opponent hit.\nA maximum of 25 Energy can be regenerated in this manner at any one time.

constellations.name: Meteorite Impact
constellations.effect: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Starfell Sword</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Everlasting Boulder
constellations.effect: The barrier created by <color=#FFD780FF>Wake of Earth</color> lasts 5s longer.\nThe meteorite created by <color=#FFD780FF>Starfell Sword</color> lasts 10s longer.

constellations.name: Piercing Fragments
constellations.effect: When a Normal Attack hits, it deals AoE DMG.

constellations.name: Shock Effect
constellations.effect: When <color=#FFD780FF>Jade Screen</color> is shattered, its CD will reset.\nCan occur once every 6s.

constellations.name: Majesty be the Array of Stars
constellations.effect: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Starshatter</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Exquisite be the Jade, Outshining All Beneath
constellations.effect: <color=#FFD780FF>Jade Screen</color> increases nearby characters' Elemental RES by 10%.

constellations.name: Invincible be the Jade Screen
constellations.effect: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Jade Screen</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Grandeur be the Seven Stars
constellations.effect: When <color=#FFD780FF>Starshatter</color> is used, Ningguang gains 7 Star Jades.

constellations.name: Ice Unleashed
constellations.effect: The last attack of Chongyun's Normal Attack combo releases 3 ice blades. Each blade deals 50% of Chongyun's ATK as <color=#99FFFFFF>Cryo DMG</color> to all opponents in its path.

constellations.name: Atmospheric Revolution
constellations.effect: Elemental Skills and Elemental Bursts cast within the Frost Field created by <color=#FFD780FF>Spirit Blade: Chonghua's Layered Frost</color> have their CD time decreased by 15%.

constellations.name: Cloudburst
constellations.effect: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Spirit Blade: Cloud-parting Star</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Frozen Skies
constellations.effect: Chongyun regenerates 1 Energy every time he hits an opponent affected by <color=#99FFFFFF>Cryo</color>.\nThis effect can only occur once every 2s.

constellations.name: The True Path
constellations.effect: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Spirit Blade: Chonghua's Layered Frost</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Rally of Four Blades
constellations.effect: <color=#FFD780FF>Spirit Blade: Cloud-parting Star</color> deals 15% more DMG to opponents with a lower percentage of their Max HP remaining than Chongyun.\nThis skill will also summon 1 additional spirit blade.

constellations.name: One Arrow to Rule Them All
constellations.effect: Fires 2 arrows per <color=#FFD780FF>Aimed Shot</color>. The second arrow deals 20% of the first arrow's DMG.

constellations.name: Bunny Triggered
constellations.effect: Baron Bunny, new and improved! Hitting Baron Bunny's foot with a fully-charged Aimed Shot manually detonates it.\nExplosion via manual detonation deals 200% additional DMG.

constellations.name: It Burns!
constellations.effect: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Fiery Rain</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: It's Not Just Any Doll...
constellations.effect: Decreases <color=#FFD780FF>Explosive Puppet</color>'s CD by 20%. Adds 1 additional charge.

constellations.name: It's Baron Bunny!
constellations.effect: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Explosive Puppet</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Wildfire
constellations.effect: <color=#FFD780FF>Fiery Rain</color> increases all party members' Movement SPD by 15% and ATK by 15% for 10s.

constellations.name: Infinite Circuit
constellations.effect: Lisa regenerates 2 Energy for every opponent hit while holding <color=#FFD780FF>Violet Arc</color>.\nA maximum of 10 Energy can be regenerated in this manner at any one time.

constellations.name: Electromagnetic Field
constellations.effect: Holding <color=#FFD780FF>Violet Arc</color> has the following effects:\n·Increases DEF by 25%.\n·Increases Lisa's resistance to interruption.

constellations.name: Resonant Thunder
constellations.effect: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Lightning Rose</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Plasma Eruption
constellations.effect: Increases the number of lightning bolts released by <color=#FFD780FF>Lightning Rose</color> by 1-3.

constellations.name: Electrocute
constellations.effect: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Violet Arc</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Pulsating Witch
constellations.effect: When Lisa takes the field, she applies 3 stacks of <color=#FFD780FF>Violet Arc</color>'s Conductive status onto nearby opponents.\nThis effect can only occur once every 5s.

constellations.name: Excellent Blood
constellations.effect: The CRIT Rate of Kaeya's Normal and Charge Attacks against opponents affected by <color=#99FFFFFF>Cryo</color> is increased by 15%.

constellations.name: Never-Ending Performance
constellations.effect: Every time <color=#FFD780FF>Glacial Waltz</color> defeats an opponent during its duration, its duration is increased by 2.5s, up to a maximum of 15s.

constellations.name: Dance of Frost
constellations.effect: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Frostgnaw</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Frozen Kiss
constellations.effect:
Triggers automatically when Kaeya's HP falls below 20%:
Creates a shield that absorbs damage equal to 30% of Kaeya's Max HP. Lasts for 20s.
This shield absorbs <color=#99FFFFFF>Cryo DMG</color> with 250% efficiency.
Can only occur once every 60s.

constellations.name: Frostbiting Embrace
constellations.effect: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Glacial Waltz</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Glacial Whirlwind
constellations.effect: <color=#FFD780FF>Glacial Waltz</color> will generate 1 additional icicle, and will regenerate 15 Energy when cast.

constellations.name: Flower of Eden
constellations.effect: Transient Blossoms generated by Albedo's <color=#FFD780FF>Abiogenesis: Solar Isotoma</color> regenerate 1.2 Energy for Albedo.

constellations.name: Opening of Phanerozoic
constellations.effect: Transient Blossoms generated by <color=#FFD780FF>Abiogenesis: Solar Isotoma</color> grant Albedo Fatal Reckoning for 30s:\n·Unleashing <color=#FFD780FF>Rite of Progeniture: Tectonic Tide</color> consumes all stacks of Fatal Reckoning. Each stack of Fatal Reckoning consumed increases the DMG dealt by Fatal Blossoms and Rite of Progeniture: Tectonic Tide's burst DMG by 30% of Albedo's DEF.\n·This effect stacks up to 4 times.

constellations.name: Grace of Helios
constellations.effect: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Abiogenesis: Solar Isotoma</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Descent of Divinity
constellations.effect: Active party members within the Solar Isotoma field have their Plunging Attack DMG increased by 30%.

constellations.name: Tide of Hadean
constellations.effect: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Rite of Progeniture: Tectonic Tide</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Dust of Purification
constellations.effect: Active party members within the Solar Isotoma field who are protected by a shield created by Crystallize have their DMG increased by 17%.

constellations.name: The Law Knows No Kindness
constellations.effect: When Yanfei uses her Charged Attack, each existing Scarlet Seal additionally reduces the stamina cost of this Charged Attack by 10% and increases resistance against interruption during its release.

constellations.name: Right of Final Interpretation
constellations.effect: Increases Yanfei's Charged Attack CRIT Rate by 20% against enemies below 50% HP.

constellations.name: Samadhi Fire-Forged
constellations.effect: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Signed Edict</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Supreme Amnesty
constellations.effect: When <color=#FFD780FF>Done Deal</color> is used:\nCreates a shield that absorbs up to 45% of Yanfei's Max HP for 15s.\nThis shield absorbs <color=#FF9999FF>Pyro DMG</color> 250% more effectively.

constellations.name: Abiding Affidavit
constellations.effect: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Done Deal</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Extra Clause
constellations.effect: Increases the maximum number of Scarlet Seals by 1.
